channel.title: All in One Messenger
channel.description: A native Mac app wrapper for Multiple Messengers

item.title: Version 1.0.0
item.description:
NOTE: This update cannot be applied automatically and must be downloaded manually by clicking "Learn More"

Features

  • All in one messenger for all your communication needs
  • Notification for all meesengers
  • Reply from notification
  • You can select your prefered notification sound
  • Menu bar icon represents the number of notifications in indicidual messsengers
